home.title: Home
home.hero: Discover the world of literature in a whole new light
home.subtitle: It's time for the literary industry to thrive in the digital age.
home.second-paragraph: Litterama is a new organization created to democratize the literary industry. We are convinced that a thorough understanding of this world is essential to its protection and promotion.

about.title: About us
about.description: Litterama is a new digital media company that aims to promote the world of books through entertaining content.
about.mission: To become a platform that is representative of the Canadian literary world and one that people can identify with.
about.vision: To create a bilingual platform where people with a passion for reading can connect and share. We want to provide entertaining and engaging multimedia content about the literary world.
